## Language

Which language are you contributing to?

- [ ] Dutch (NL)
- [ ] English (EN)
- [ ] German (DE)
- [ ] French (FR)
- [ ] Spanish (ES)
- [ ] Other: [Specify]

## Type of Contribution

- [ ] New language (complete translation)
- [ ] Improvement to existing translations
- [ ] Fix translation errors
- [ ] Add missing translation keys

## Translation Keys

Which translation keys are you adding/modifying? (List them or say "all")

```
Example:
- title
- temperature
- humidity
```

## Translations

Provide your translations here:

```python
'key1': 'Translation text',
'key2': 'Translation text',
```

## Context

Any context or notes about these translations:

- Cultural considerations
- Technical terminology choices
- Formality level used

## Testing

- [ ] I have tested these translations in the UI
- [ ] I have checked for text overflow issues
- [ ] The translations maintain consistent tone
- [ ] Technical terms are accurate

## Screenshots (Optional)

If you have screenshots showing the translations in the UI, please add them here.

## Native Speaker Confirmation

- [ ] I am a native speaker of this language
- [ ] I have consulted with a native speaker
- [ ] This is a machine translation (needs review)
